manga_parser docs¶

class manga_parser.MangaParser(local: bool = False)¶

Retrieves the contents of lists on web pages, mostly chapter names from lists.

__init__(local: bool = False) → None¶
@param local: optional, default False

True - use local Selenium False - use Selenium Docker
